body.name: Waterpik BeWell Bidet Attachment BDT-001 Non-Electric Water Spray Angle and Adjustable Pressure, Self-Cleaning, Easy DIY Installation Toilet Seat Sprayer, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 11 mins
features: HIGH-QUALITY DURABLE MATERIALS: Ultra-thin bidet attachment includes a braided metal high-pressure hose and solid brass T-valve. Unlike many brands, Waterpik also includes a metal double-check valve for backflow prevention.

DUAL SPRAY ADJUSTMENT: Easily customize both spray pressure and spray angle. Adjust spray strength from gentle rinse to a targeted jet. Adjust spray direction - making it effective for both posterior and feminine wash.

EASY, DIY INSTALL – WORKS ON MOST TOILETS: Install yourself and start treating yourself to a fresher, cleaner feel on a daily basis. For added convenience, spray nozzle retracts when not in use and has a self-cleaning mode.
FROM WATERPIK, A BRAND YOU’VE TRUSTED FOR OVER 60 YEARS: Waterpik is a trusted leader in engineering innovative plumbing and oral care products that use water to deliver health and wellness benefits.
2-YEAR WARRANTY, U.S. CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM: Esteemed Colorado-based customer support team is ready to help with any questions or concerns.
body.description: Start treating yourself to a fresher, cleaner feel on a daily basis. Ultra-thin bidet attachment for toilets includes a braided metal high-pressure hose and solid brass T-valve. Unlike many brands, Waterpik also includes a metal double-check valve for backflow prevention. Easy to install and works on most toilets. Features customizable spray direction and angle, and the nozzle retracts when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer for my toilet !
reviews.reviewText: The Waterpik BeWell Bidet Attachment BDT-001 has transformed my bathroom experience.The DIY installation of the bidet was surprisingly straightforward. With clear instructions and all the necessary components provided, I was able to set it up in no time. The universal design made it compatible with my existing toilet, eliminating the need for professional installation. It's a do-it-yourself project that anyone can do!The flexibility offered by the adjustable spray angle and pressure settings is a standout feature. This customization ensures a personalized and comfortable cleansing experience. Whether looking for a gentle cleanse or that "hit the spot" spray, the Waterpik BeWell Bidet Attachment caters to individual preferences effortlessly.It operates solely on water pressure, eliminating the need for power outlets or batteries. This not only contributes to energy efficiency but also simplifies the overall functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looking forward to using this little guy! I like the design is thinner than others I have seen. I like not having so much bulk. Purchased one of these for a family member who raved about it and is helping install it later. Seems easy to install and great quality! Looking forward to experiencing all the great reviews from others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The installation parts are sketchy at best. Very poorly designed and a lot of fittings are just thrown together in order to attach it to the water line. The one adapter they came up with has two check valves inside of it. The geniuses that assembled these adapters put the check valves in backwards. I bought two bidets and had to remove the internal lock ring and pull the check valves out. I discarded the cheap valves and assembled the unit without the valves. I do not recommend these bidets and would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bidet does what it says it will do. The piece is plastic as are most of the fittings. I would have preferred sturdier materials but overall, this is a nice option if looking for something cost efficient. I did have a little trouble getting it all together, but that could be just user error and my first time trying to set one of these up. I'd recommend this product, but personally would upgrade to have more luxuries for my next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must try at least once
reviews.reviewText: The Waterpik BeWell Bidet has truly revolutionized my bathroom experience. Its user-friendly design and efficient functionality make it a standout addition to my daily routine.The adjustable water pressure and dual nozzle system provide a personalized and thorough cleansing experience. The intuitive controls are easy to use, allowing for quick adjustments to suit individual preferences. The self-cleaning feature adds an extra layer of convenience and hygiene.Installation was surprisingly straightforward, even for someone with limited plumbing experience. The bidet's slim and unobtrusive design seamlessly integrates with my existing toilet, giving it a modern and sleek appearance.The eco-friendly aspect of the Waterpik BeWell Bidet cannot be overlooked. The reduction in toilet paper usage not only benefits the environment but also contributes to long-term cost savings.I appreciate the durability and quality of the materials used in its construction. The bidet feels sturdy and well-built, assuring me of its long-lasting performance.In summary, the Waterpik BeWell Bidet has exceeded my expectations in terms of comfort, ease of use, and environmental impact. It's a fantastic addition to any bathroom, providing a refreshing and hygienic experience that enhances daily hygiene practices. I highly recommend it to anyone considering upgrading their bathroom amenities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first bidet
reviews.reviewText: This has made me realize I’ve been missing out my whole life. This one will eventually be moving to the half bathroom as soon as I upgrade to a fully loaded bidet seat cover. Now that I know how great a bidet can be I’m shopping for one with the heated water and air dryer! This product specifically is very barebones. That is not a negative though because it’s a great value for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An easy to istall , and great quality bidet!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very easy to install and it is very adaptable to different toilets. The way it is designed, it will probably fit any toilet. It is very easy to adjust the install position. It is very thin.The operation is very good. You can get the water where you need it and the pressure is great.A very good Bidet that works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Waterpark BeWell Bidet. On the install, everything was easy until I got to the T adapter. It came with a flat washer to attach to the flush valve instead of the industry standard cone washer. Couldn't get it to stop leaking! These fittings are supposed to be installed finger tight and not leak. After multiple install and uninstalls, (about an hour and lots of water on the floor) I finally twisted the fitting hard enough with a liberal coating of silicone grease on the washer. I was afraid that I would break the plastic flush valve with the stress required to get the fitting tight enough. I guess the manufacturer saved maybe 5 cents by using flat washer. I'll pick up the correct part next time I'm at a plumbing supply or I'll just return the item. If you don't recognize the terms I'm using in this review, you probably need to have a plumber do the install for you. He'll probably have the correct part on his truck. Update: I decided to return the item. The water control knob has 2 pressure stops. The first one just causes water to dribble out of the nozzle shield. The second stop shoots water out. I am guessing that it is probably the built-in backflow preventer, but not sure. I purchased a different brand, and it also had a flat washer for the fresh water connection. In anticipation of this, I purchased a cone washer: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000H5SXU2?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details&th=1 Hooked everything up and no leaks.
